summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 14 December to end of Wednesday 15 December GMT
description: Tuesday will be dry with cloud cover and some brighter spells, feeling mild. Similar forecast for Wednesday. Continued air feed from the Atlantic.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
